question: 赤ちゃん
sourceMnemonic: <ja>ちゃん</ja> is the honorific you put on a child's name. So, who is this mysterious child you're calling <kanji>red</kanji>? When a baby is born, what color are they? You got it, they're all red. And, because you want to be nice and cute you add <ja>ちゃん</ja> to that. That's why <ja>あかちゃん</ja> is a <vocabulary>baby</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: If you know the reading of the kanji <kanji><ja>赤</ja></kanji> you should know the reading of this too.
